raw: Virus tests on EPL players ahead of return-to-training talks .
replaced: Virus tests on EPL players ahead of return-to-training talks .

raw: With Britain suffering a worse coronavirus outbreak than Germany , the sports shutdown is yet to end and players would have to remain socially distant for now in training .
replaced: With Britain suffering a worse coronavirus outbreak than Germany , the sports shutdown is yet to end and players would have to remain socially distant for now in training .

raw: But the Premier League has government backing to pursue restarting games in June if there is no new spike in COVID-19 cases across the country .

raw: Sunday should have been the last day of the season but , instead of Liverpool completing a title triumph , coronavirus testing was taking place at clubs .

raw: Up to 40 players and coaches at each club were due to be tested for the coronavirus across Sunday and Monday .

raw: A further wave of testing will take place across the 20 clubs later in the week in a bid to detect infections .

raw: In recent weeks , players have only been carrying out some individual fitness work on fields at some training grounds .
replaced: In recent weeks , players have only been carrying out some individual fitness work on fields at some training grounds .

raw: But the socially distant team training could start on Tuesday if the protocols are agreed on by executives from the clubs during their latest “ Project Restart ” conference call on Monday .

raw: Contact training would be prohibited until approval is granted by the government , which has said games could resume in June — without fans in stadiums .
replaced: Contact training would be prohibited until approval is granted by the government , which has said games could resume in June — without fans in stadiums .

raw: Some players and managers have expressed concern about returning to training since Britain has Europe ’s highest virus death toll as well as the most confirmed cases .

raw: “ You ’d need a full four to five weeks ( training ) , especially if you ’re going to go back into competition , when you ’re literally paid to win , ” Manchester City forward Raheem Sterling said in a YouTube interview with United States captain Megan Rapinoe .

raw: The aspiration of resuming the league in the week beginning June 8 now appears hard to achieve .

raw: Liverpool led the league by 25 points with nine games remaining when the season was paused in March .
replaced: Liverpool led the Premier League by 25 points with nine games remaining when the season was paused in March .
